name: Evodevo: Enhanced Edition
description:
In a world inhabited by robots, a new species appears that is capable of adapting itself to its environment. This new breed must make a collective decision: reach for the surest means of survival, or be unfavourably compared to the dodo.

Based on feedback from participants in the first Godot Wild Jam, the enhanced edition of Evodevo adds:

  • More levels
  • More enemies
  • More unlockable parts
  • New game modes
  • Improved graphics
  • Rebalanced mechanics
  • Story sequences w/ multiple endings
